Follow these steps to add a new font from the Microsoft Store:

Select **Start** > **Settings** > **Personalization** > **Fonts**, and select **Get more fonts in Microsoft Store** Shopping bag-shaped Store icon.

Find the font you want to add.

Select **Get** or **Buy**. The font will download automatically.

**Note**: Not all programs or apps support custom fonts. If your new font isn’t showing up as an option, try another program to see if font is working properly.
